title: Your algorithm sucks ass
body: Somehow three people can all build mages and get lots of units but I can be the only person building berserkers and get virtually nothing. So that's fun.

replies.body: Even if the algorithm sucks, everyone has the same algorithm, so it shouldn't really matter.

> [{quoted}](name=NeonPanda,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BgAYaLdJ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2020-02-20T20:59:55.128+0000)
>
> Even if the algorithm sucks, everyone has the same algorithm, so it shouldn't really matter.

I mean it's bad on both ends. One person is always extremely stacked and one person is always extremely dooked on. The disparity between both ends of the RNG spectrum is... really frustrating?

Yeah ngl, especially when building Berserkers, I NEVER find the components, even if I'm the single only person building any Berserkers.

And yet...even though 3+ people are building Rangers I'm still able to build a full Poison Rangers team lmao
Rolled through 40 gold to find the 9th brand I needed to get a level 3 brand and never found him. Would've secured my victory but instead it got me fourth place. Thanks for that.
clearly should have started working towards a different strategy.

> [{quoted}](name=Poot Lovato,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BgAYaLdJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-20T02:39:52.064+0000)
>
> Somehow three people can all build mages

They were two separate games, bruh.

A friendly reminder that they still called it "tactics"

:o)
sometimes i dont get what i want and i complain about it

> [{quoted}](name=Proƒyt,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BgAYaLdJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-20T03:29:21.795+0000)
>
> sometimes i dont get what i want and i complain about it

Sometimes I don't get something that should be in my pool very late into the game that costs me a higher spot because it's a difference of ~2000 damage and I complain about it.*
